sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { BlockIcon, CheckmarkCircleIcon, Flex, CrownIcon, Text, TeamPlayerIcon, TrophyGoldIcon, Skeleton, } from '@pancakeswap/uikit' import { useTranslation } from 'contexts/Localization' import { UserTradingInformationProps } from '../../types' import { useCompetitionCakeRewards, getRewardGroupAchievements } from '../../helpers' import { BoldTd, Td, StyledPrizeTable } from '../StyledPrizeTable' const StyledThead = styled.thead` border-bottom: 2px solid ${({ theme }) => theme.colors.cardBorder}; ` const UserPrizeGrid: React.FC<{ userTradingInformation?: UserTradingInformationProps }> = ({ userTradingInformation, }) => { const { t } = useTranslation() const { userRewardGroup, userCakeRewards, userPointReward, canClaimNFT } = userTradingInformation const { cakeReward, dollarValueOfCakeReward } = useCompetitionCakeRewards(userCakeRewards) const { champion, teamPlayer } = getRewardGroupAchievements(userRewardGroup) return ( {t('CAKE Prizes')} {t('Achievements')} {t('NFT')} {cakeReward.toFixed(2)} {dollarValueOfCakeReward ? ( ~{dollarValueOfCakeReward} USD ) : ( )} {champion && } {teamPlayer && } + {userPointReward} {t('Points')} {canClaimNFT ? : } ) } export default UserPrizeGrid
